trans-unit.source: Defines constants that inform <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*> about how it should validate a container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Definerer konstanter informere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>om hvordan den må validere en beholder underordnede kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A> will validate all enabled controls in a container, such as a form.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>vil validere alle aktivert kontroller i en beholder, for eksempel et skjema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to restrict the types of controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne opplistingen til å begrense kontrolltypene som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: You can combine these enumerated values together with a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kombinere disse nummererte verdiene sammen med en bitvis OR-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Combining parameters with a bitwise OR operator will result in a logical AND operation.
trans-unit.target: Kombinerer parametere med en bitvis OR-operator vil føre til en logisk AND-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, calling `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` will only raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event on controls that are both immediate children of the container AND are enabled.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kaller `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` vil bare øke det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>hendelse på kontroller som er begge umiddelbar underordnet beholderen og er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify ImmediateChildren when you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, the method will require that you validate all child controls in the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir ImmediateChildren når du kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, metoden, må du validere alle underordnede kontroller i kontrollen hierarkiet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Validerer underordnede kontrollerer der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that are directly hosted within the container.
trans-unit.target: Validerer underordnede kontroller som ligger direkte i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Does not validate any of the children of these children.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke valideres noen av underordnede til følgende underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that contains a custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref>, and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>, using ImmediateChildren will cause the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> to occur, but not the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> som inneholder en egendefinert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref> inneholder en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>, ved hjelp av ImmediateChildren vil føre til at den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref> oppstår, men ikke i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Validates all child controls, and all children of these child controls, regardless of their property settings.
trans-unit.target: Validerer alle underordnede kontroller, og alle underordnede underordnede kontroller, uavhengig av egenskapsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Validerer underordnede kontroller som kan velges.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> value set, which means that the user can navigate to the control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Validerer underordnede kontroller som har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>verdi som betyr at brukeren kan gå til kontrollen bruker du TAB.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Validerer underordnede kontrollerer der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
